original_text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit, and the Spirit against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.
korean_text: 육체의 소욕은 성령을 거스르고 성령은 육체를 거스르나니 이 둘이 서로 대적함으로 너희가 원하는 것을 하지 못하게 하려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit
and the Spirit against the flesh
and these are contrary the one to the other
so that ye cannot do the things that ye would
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 원하는 것을 하지 못하게 하려 함이라
